page.title: 18D-BLOCK QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: We sent a questionnaire to all the people living in our D-block, using {electoral rolls}for three{parishes. We had a 45% return.There were 135 people in our survey.Most of them are in the 31-60 age group.The rest are spread over the remaining age groups.Most people and their parents were born outside Cornwall.The majority of people have lived in our D-block for less than five years.Most people travel eleven miles to shops and banks.Two thirds of our sample go to the{cinema}and{theatre occasionally.One half of the families surveyed use a{library}eleven miles away.Most people either work on farms or are retired.
